title: Luminescence properties of a green-emitting mechanoluminescent phosphor CaSrGa4O8:xTb3+ without pre-excitation
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,10726-10735
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01745E, Paper
Open Access

Rui Shi, Wei Liu, Lin Li, Huan Li, Zhijun Zhang, Guanghui Rao, Jingtai Zhao
The strong green mechanoluminescence and long persistent luminescence properties of CaSrGa4O8:Tb3+ without pre-excitation were observed for the first time.
